name: Martin's Coursera Notes
body:
## Cousera Course Notes

This is a list of notes from courses I attended on Coursera. It is usually just an outline and it could be mixed with different languages (depending on the course language). 

* 导演思维：微电影人的自我修养 ([Course Website](https://www.coursera.org/learn/daoyan-siwei-weiyingren), [Notes]())
* Introduction to Classical Music ([Course Website](https://www.coursera.org/learn/introclassicalmusic), [Notes]())
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
